properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 10:21PM EST until February 14 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25
knots and waves 4 to 6 feet. For the Gale Watch on Saturday,
southwest gales of 35 to 40 knots with waves of 6 to 12 feet.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Holland.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM EST Friday.
For the Gale Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and large waves will pose a hazard to
mariners.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST FRIDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING
